name: 楊韻華
objective:
本課程講授以國際交流中社交及商務場域為主軸，深入分析國際人士於跨文化溝通中需具備之策略與技巧。
This course center its emphasis on international communication in various social and business contexts, strategies and skills will be introduced to enhance students’ international communicative competence. At the successful conclusion of this course, students shall be able to
Understand the cultural differences among nations.
Demonstrate the international business communication skills.
Develop International Etiquette.
Understanding Image management.
Learning to deal skillfully with dilemma.
scorePolicy:
Each student must fulfill the following requirements:
Students are required to attend all lectures; punctuality is prioritized. Lateness for twenty minutes (after 6:50 pm) is considered as an unexcused absence.
A brief reflection regarding each lecture is required for all students enrolled in this class. Reflection papers can be written in either Chinese or English. No word count is necessary. All papers need to be typed and submitted online.
Students are invited to share with the class their ideas and opinions regarding the previous and current lecture(s).
Participate in course activities and respond to questions in class discussion if necessary.
1. Five lecture reflection papers 12% each= 50%
2. Attendance (Each absence will result in a penalty of 10% grade deduction) 50%
3. Plagiarism are grounds for failure of the course.
